div.p:
In curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio primo die februarij anno Domini
mo iiijco lxxvj Johannes Dogude faber adiudicatur in amerciamento pro deforciacione et pertur
bacione Duncanj stralogh seriandi per concessionem suam propriam in ministracione sui officij

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem die tercia mensis
februarij predicti /

quo die Alexander huchonson adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie
ex eo quod iniuste negauit inuenire le mawranschip ad piscandum cum
andrea rettre in aqua de le pot / et quod tenetur facere le mawranschip
cum dicto andrea in piscaria predicta / uel satisfacere vnam barellam salmonum
toto le cavyl eiusdem aque prout compertum fuit et deliberatum per assisam

The same dai / anent the clame and debate of ane half nettis fisching of the Raik
that pertenit til Johne of ruthirfurd debatabil betuix Dauid menyes on
the ta part / and the executouris of Androw alanson that is tosay cristian of cadiou the
spous' of quhilum the said Androw and ser Wilyam Donaldson on the tothir part /
It is appointit and fullely accordit betuix the said partijs / that thai sal vndirly
and fulfil the decrete and deliuerence of thir personis vndirwritin Alexander of chavmer
Johne of mar Dauid colison Robert of culan Dauid symson Johne andro
son patrik badenagh alexander hay Richard hil Wilyam cantlee Adam of cra
furd Androw murref eldar Wilyam the hay James craik Androw moir edmond
lowson and Johne Duncanson gilbert morison / tobe sworne apon ane assise for the decisione and
determinacione of the said wattir / apon thorisda next tocum the vj dai of this
instant moneth / And baith the partijs fornemit ar oblist be the faith of thare
bodiis thare handis wphaldin to vndirly and fulfil thare determinacione and
deliuerence as forsaid is / And the said assise sal tak to thaim quhat persons
that ples' thame

The sext dai of the moneth of februar' forsaid / the fornemit persons chosin
apon ane assise in the caus' movit betuix Dauid menyes on the ta part / and
ser Wilyam Donaldson chaplan and cristian of Cadiou the spous' of vmquhi
le androw alanson and executouris of his last wil on the tothir part / comperit before
the aldirman and balliez in Jugement / and war sworne in presence of the partiez for the
finale decision and determinacione of the said caus' anent ane half net of the
Raik of the wattir' of Dee that pertenit sum tyme til Johne of ruthirfurd
debatabil betuix the saidis partiez / The quhilkis persons sworne /
allegacionis resounys pruffis and witnez of bath the partis herd and
thame vndirstandin / the parties sindri tymes fra the assise removit and agane
entirit / the maneris and circumstancis of the forsaid causis considerit throu athir
the parties In presence of the aldirman and ballies of this burgh sittand in Jugement
as forsaid is / thai decretit and deliuerit / that the said Dauid meignes has na
right to the forsaid half net of the Raik / the quhilk decrete was gevin
be the mouthe of Alexander of chavmer in the name of the lave of the assise forsaid

the same dai thomas symson and his forspekar thomas fyif producit before the balyeis in the court certan
witnez vndirwritin topreve the excepcione made be thaim agane the procuratour producit be Dauid
crukschank on the behalf of the son and ayr of quhilum Johne edwardson litstar callit thomas in the
said procuratour / the quhilk as thai allegit suld be callit matho / quhilkis witnes the gret
aith sworn and particulary examinit deponit as eftir folowis

Matho fichet first witnes deponis and declaris that
quhilum his wife quham god
assoilye was god modir til the said Johne edwardsonis son' and optenit the name of him
fra his god fadiris thom litstar in the galogate and thom alanson / and gert cal him matho

Item the said thomas litstar second witnes accordis in his deposicione with the first / and that throu the
request and desire of his said god modir / he the said thomas litstar and thom alanson quhom
god assolye god fadiris til the said child grantit til hir the name and was baptisit and
callit matho at funtstane / and that he wes nevyr confirmit be the bischop tomak ony changing
of the said name that he herd or wist of hiddirtillis

Jonet fichet third witnes deponis that scho knavis weil that hir said son was hovyn with matho
and that he wes nevyr confermit as said is be the bischop that scho wate of
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio vija die mensis februarij anno et cetera lxxvjto /

quo die
Johannes de lammyntoune carnifex adiudicatur in amerciamento per concessionem suam propriam
pro iniusta perturbacione gilberti morison / et tenetur emendare sibi vt Jura volunt
vnde assisa ordinavit ipsum in partem emende ad dandum dimidium libre cere ad lumen beati sanguinis

In curia legali burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xo die februarij
anno predicto / Dauid crukschank primo die vocatus responsurus plegio per thomam
symson in manibus philippi de Dunbrek seriandi burgi super eundem porrecto pro iniusta
detencione octodecim librarum vsualis monete scocie ad bonum compotum ab ipso thoma
vt continetur in cedula per ipsum thomam desuper ballivis et eidem seriando presentat' / Non comparuit
quare precipitur seriando leuare districtum ab eodem et cetera et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Eodem die Dauid crukschank vocatus ad comparendum tanquam quarto et die peremptorio responsurus
plegio per thomam symson et Jonetam fichet sponsam suam super ipsum porrecto pro iniusta
detencione quatuor dimediorum sive le demyis auri duodecim solidorum argenti et
duarum petrarum lane ab eisdem thoma et Joneta / Non comparuit / vnde hora
diei legittima expectata / thomas fife prelocutor thome symson et dicte Jonete
porrexit plegium in manibus philippi de Dunbrek vnius seriandorum / quod iidem
thomas et Jonete sponsa sua peruenerunt ad causam et clameum suum de dictis
summis et bonis contra et aduersus antedictum Dauid crukschank causa non defensa
Et hoc idem datum fuit pro iudicio per os thome scissoris Judicatoris curie ex
decreto eiusdem curie et quod satisfaciet infra terminum Juris / Et quod est in iiijor
amerciamentis pro absencia sua ab ista curia et tribus curiis precedentibus
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xjo die februarij anno et cetera lxxvj /

quo die Robertus
marnagh conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbacione Alexandri mar fabri et emenda
bit sibi ad visum proborum virorum

In curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem xiiijto die februarij pre
dicti / comparens Elizabeth stevinson sponsa quondam Johannis moyses constituit et ordinauit
Willelmum moyses suum filium suum procuratorem in causa mota inter ipsam et gilbertum
morison et in omnibus aliis causis ipsam concernentibus Et promisit de Rato et cetera

The same dai the Aldirman and thir persons of the consale Alexander of chavmer Johne of
Knollis Dauid colison Robert of culan Johne the vaus Alexander rede gilbert
of chavmer Adam of crafurd Dauid mathoson and Robert blindsele has deli
uerit and ordanit / that Alexander trail sal remayn with the wattir that was
cristy litstaris tobrouke and ioys' the same ay and quhil he be fred of the
payment of the thre termys mail

Eodem die coram Alexandro rede vno ballivorum Walterus morison assignauit gilberto
morison filio suo xviij s' et x d' sibi debito per margretam cryne et constituit
dictum gilbertum suum procuratorem ad prosequendum legittime eandem margretam de dicta sum
ma Et promisit de rato cum ceteris clausulis necessariis Vnde prepositus ordinauit
dictam margretam comparere in pretorio coram ballivis hodie ad octo dies responsurus et iuri
periturus pro iniusta detencione dicte summe et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxv die februarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxvjto /

quo die Johannes
lambynton' adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie per concessionem propriam pro iniusta perturbacione
Roberti carnificis / et tenetur emendare sibi vt Jura volunt vnde assisa ordi
nauit ipsum in partem emende ad dandum dimidium libre cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis

Eodem die georgius browne amerciatur pro iniusta detencione septem diodenarum cipho
rum a murthaco glenmalvyne prout compertum fuit per assisam / et satisfaciet eidem
infra terminum Juris

Item eodem die iniungitur margrete cryne per prepositum et ballivos ad comparendum coram ipsis
die veneris proximo futuro responsurus et Juri periturus ad instanciam gilberti morison super
plegio per ipsum gilbertum in manibus Johannis vaus seriandi super eandem porrecto
pro iniusta detencione xviij s' et x d' ab eodem

the same dai the assise has deliuerit and ordanit that Johne stevyn as mar
chand til James craik and William of cantlie / aw to fulfil thare billis deli
uerit til him eftir the tenour of the same

Willelmus robertson et Ricardus hil conuicti per assisam quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio
adinuicem / et emendabit alter alteri vt Jura volunt vnde precipitur ipsis ad solvendum quilibet
dimidium libre cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

Item eodem die Robertus de Kintor coram preposito et ballivis in curia concessus fuit se debere
Johannj Wormot xxviij s ' / et ballivi ordinauerunt ipsum ad satisfaciendum dictam summam
infra terminum Juris

Item Alexander trail amerciatur pro iniusta prosecucione gilberti morison super aqua cristino lit
star olim concernen'

Item quidam Rury commorans in vico viridi amerciatur pro perturbacione Donaldi scissoris prout de
liberatum fuit per assisam / per quam eciam repertum fuit quod inobediuit philippum Dunbrek
et Johannem vaus seriandos suum officium ministran' et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die vltima februarij anno et cetera lxxvijto /

quo die Willelmus
moyses primo die vocatus ad sectam thome chapman responsurus plegio per ipsum
thomam in manibus Duncanj stralogh seriandi super eundem extenso pro iniusta detencione xxij
solidorum ab ipso thoma Non comparuit / Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum ab eodem et cetera
et premunire ipsum ad comparendum die lune videlicet tercio die mensis marcij proximo futuro
tanquam secundo die processus

the same day Dauid blabre was adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' fo
lowing be a borgh of Johne of Wellis Jok matland and thare falowschip
of ane ankyr and a cabil / and thai quite of his clame

In Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito and ballivis vija die marcij anno pre
dicto / Willelmus moyses obligatur et fatetur se solvend' xxxij s' thome chapman
sibi per eundem debit' citra festum pasche proximo futuro uel infra viij dies post dictum
festum sine vlteriori dilacione

the same dai Anent the borgh strekit be thomas fif on the behalf of Johne stevyn
and Johne glenny apon Wil robertson of the wrangwis' oute halding of thare
gudis and thare merchandis gudis of cornelus aventuris schip throu him as ane
of the causaris tharof / the assise tharupon chosin and sworn has fundin and deliuerit
that the said Wil robertson suld haf til his quartar in the said schip / xj lastis
and a half and thre barellis And sua thai fynd that he has mare in than
his quartar a half barel tobe refoundit to the merchandis / for the quhilk he
was adiugit in amerciament of the court
Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio decimo die marcij anno et cetera lxxvjto /

quo die
venerabilis in christo pater Willelmus Abbas de Dere proposuit quod ad eius noticiam deuenit
quod quedam terra jacente in le futy que sibi et monasterio de Dere tenebatur in decem
solidis annuj redditus / alienatur fratribus predicatoribus de Abirdene per quondam Andre
am alanj in ipsorum dampnum et preiudicium non modicum et grauamen / Quare prefatus dominus
Abbas pro se et conuentu suo sollemniter protestabatur quod huiusmodi alienacio non eis cederet
in dampnum et preiudicium Juramentum Ipsorum quam ad dictum annuum redditum et ad proprietatem
fundi eiusdem terre in quam eis de iure incumbit ad eundem fund' Eciam dictus
dominus Abbas constituit venerabilem virum magistrum Johannem levingston vicarium
de Inuerugy et Adam de crafurd suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim ad arestandum
et namandum dictam terram et fruges desuper crescen' tempore debito totiens quotiens
opus fuerit et de iure licebit promittendo de rato et cetera

Eodem die Andreas culan deuenit plegius legalis pro Andrea naghti et Ricardo
roberti quod quilibet erit indempnis de alio aliter quam Jura volunt

The xj dai of marche yer' et cetera lxxvj / at the instance and request of a mighti lord
George Erle of huntlie lord gordon and of badenagh / the Aldirman and the consale
has grantit and consentit / that James cumming burges of this ton' sal haue at the
next assedacion of the wattiris / ane tak of wattir that he salbe plesit of reson'
and the bettir for my lordis saik / And thir are the namys of thaim that made the
said grant beand present in the tym Androw scherar' aldirman alexander chavmer of murchil
alexander menyes Johne of Knollis Dauid colison alexander howison alexander rede David
symson thomas of chavmer Robert blindsel Johne Wormot Johne the vaus Wilyam
hay William blinsel yungar thom of mar gilbert morison Adam of crafurd and
Dauid mathoson et cetera

Item eodem de dominus Willelmus Donaldi capellanus et cristiana cadiou Relicta Andree alanson
quondam burgensis de Aberdene ac executores vltime voluntatis eiusdem Andre presentarunt preposito et
ballivis ac consulibus huius burgi litteras domini nostri Regis sibi signeto pro earundem execucione
debito fienda / quarum quidem litterarum tenor sequitur sibi hac forma James be the grace of god king
of scottis To the Aldirman and balyes of our burgh of aberdene greting ffor samekil as it is
hevily menit til ws be the executouris of vmquhile Androw alanson burges of our said
burgh / that now of late Dauid menyeis yongar be wrang and sinister informacion purchest
our lettres chargeing you to entir him to the half nettis fisching of the Raak pertening vm
quhile to Johne of ruthirfurd as he allegit / and til ws be reson of eschete / he paying
tharfor to the saidis executouris the some' of xxv merkis / quhilkis was fundin be ane assise
that the said fisching pertenit to the sadis executouris and nocht as the said Dauid allegit
like as autentik instrumentis tharupon clerly proportis Oure wil is herfor and we char
ge you stratly and commandis that ye make the sadis executouris be incontinent ansuerit and
obeyit of the said fisching for al thar' termes contenit in thar' assedacion And that
ye charge the said Dauid in our name that he desist and cess' of al vexacion of the
saidis executouris in tym tocum in the brouking of the said fisching vndir the pain and charge
that eftir may folou Sen it is fundin be the said assise that he had na right
tharto And in like wise that ye mak the saidis executouris tobe ansuerit and obeyit in al
takkis and assedacionis within our said burgh in al pointis contenit in the testiment of vm
quhile the said Androw as law wil And eftir the tenor of our vthir lettres direct to
you of before As ye wil ansuer' til ws tharupon And vndir al pain and charge
that eftir may folou Deliuering thir our lettres be you deuly execut and indorsit
as efferis agane to the berar' gevin vndir our signet at Edinburgh the xxv day
of februar And of our Regne the xvij yer .
James R
Scheuez
Quibus litteris domini Regis lectis in presencia magnifici domini Georgij comitis Huntlie tunc
presentis et instantis in subsidium dictorum executorum / prepositus ballivi et consules predicti avisati con
concesserunt ad faciendum debitam execucionem dictarum litterarum in omnibus iuxta tenorem earundem
mandati Regis

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xiiijto die marcij anno Domini
mo iiiijco lxxvjto

quo die Willelmus hay inuenit Johannem vaus fratrem gilberti plegium
legalem pro eo de indempnitate Johannis de Dunde cordonarij aliter quam Jura volunt Et
Dauid mar deuenit plegius pro dicto Johanne de indempnitate Willelmi hay vt supra

The same dai Dauid colison Alexander rede Johne of Knollis Dauid symson Johne
Wormot gilbert vaus and Androw moir chosin in ane assise be Johne glenny
and Johne stevyn on the ta part / and thomas schethin on the tothir part to decide and
end the clame and debate betuix the saidis partiis anent the oute halding
of certane gudis oute of cornelus aventuris schip / and obliste til vndirly and
obserue thare decrete and ordinance / quhilkis persons the gret aith sworne
the allegiance of bath the partis herd and vndirstandin and tharupon riply avisit
has fundin and deliuerit / the said thomas of schethin dettour til Johne glenny
forsaid of the wranguis' oute halding of half a hundre buyrdis oute
of the said cornelus schip for the quhilk he was adiugit in amerciament
and tocontent the sam John glenny of the said buyrdis within laghful tym

The xvij dai of marche yer' of god et cetera lxxvj / the Aldirman and the balyes chargit
William quelp todevode and red the chavmer / the quhilk he now inhabitis at Wit
sundai next tocum dischargeand him of the malis bigane sa that he red it be
the said tyme as he has grantit / And falyeand that he red nocht the said chav
mer free at the said feist of Witsundai or within viij dais at the ferrest thareftir
topay the malis aucht be him of al termis bigane

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem coram Andrea scherar' preposito alexandro rede et
Johanne Wormot ijobus ballivorum dicti burgi xixo die marcij anno predicto

div.head: Inquisicio
div.p:
Alexander menyes chavmer de murchil Dauid colison thomas de mar' Jacobus craik Willelmus rettre
Johannes stewart Walterus morison Dauid mathoson Robertus blinsele Willelmus
hay Willelmus blindsel senior Dauid symson andreas culan patricius badenagh Willelmus
blindsel iunior Gilbertus de camera alexander howison Johannes vaus frater gilberti /
Andreas murref senior Johannes Duncanson Adam de crafurd Qui iurati dicunt quod Alexander
glastir est incompos mentis fatuus et naturaliter ydiota / secundum eorum noticiam et esti
macionem sicut eundem a diuersis annis retroactis viderunt et cognouerunt / sic quod timetur de
alienacione tam terrarum suarum quare aliarum rerum mobilium et immobilium Et quod Alexander
glastir filius et heres quondam Andree glastir est proximior consanguineus patris sui / et
quod dictus alexander proximior est sue rei prouidus et poteus canere ydonere de administracione
rei aliene / et quod est etatis xviij annorum uel eocirca et cetera

Vicesima die mensis marcij predicti Coram thoma de camera vno ballivorum Johannes stevin constituit
thomam fife suum procuratorem in causa mota seu monenda inter ipsum et thomam schethyn / et in omnibus
aliis causis ipsum tangen' per quoscumque Et promisit de Rato et cetera testibus Andrea branche
Jacobi de Kyntor et Johanne glenny cum diuersis alijs

Eodem die in presencia dicti ballivi Johannes glenny fecit et ordinavit thomam de fife suum
legittimum procuratorem in omnibus causis ad prosequendum optinendum et defendendum vniuersas actiones
sibi pertinentes contra quoscumque et per quoscumque motas seu monendas ipsum tangens promittens Ratum
et gratum et cetera cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis / coram testibus predictis

In curia tenta per ballivos xxjo die marcij ballivi ordinauerunt thomam gillespy tanquam
plegium alexandri cummyng ad satisfaciendum Johanni Wormot l s' infra terminum Juris

Die xxija mensis marcij predicti coram preposito et Johanne Wormot ballivo comparuit Dauid de
Kyntor burgensis huius burgi / et deuenit plegius pro Willelmo Kyntor executoribus quondam andree alanj
ad ipsos liberandum et indempnes conservandum penes prepositum et communitatem huius burgi de firma dimedij re
this de li fuyrdis pro terminis sue assedacionis secundum tenorem sue obligacionis desuper fact' Et dictus
Willelmus obligavit se ad releuandum eundem Dauid et liberandum de solucione dicte firme durantibus terminis prenotatis

Memorandum quod die xxiiijta mensis marcij Anno Domini mo iiijco lxxvjto Comparuit coram preposito et bal
liuis venerabilis vir dominus Alexander club capellanus asserens quod thomas de camera vnus ballivorum
tradidit saisinam et possessionem margarete ihoneston' affidate Roberti club fratris dicti dominj
alexandri de quadam terra cum pertinenciis iacente in vico viridi contigue prope terram thome litstar
de qua quadam terra cum pertinenciis dictus dominus Alexander dicit se habere realem possesionem prout ostendebat
per litteram testimonialem Jacobi cumming tunc vnius ballivorum huius burgi sub datum annj Domini mille
simo iiijco lxxvj mensis septembris die xiiij / et dicta sasina tradita fuit per thomam de camera
xxjo die instantis marcij // quare idem dominus Alexander peciit a preposito et ballivis quod prefatus thomas
de camera balliuus adiret secum eandem terram cum pertinenciis ad videndum et audiendum huiusmodi pretensam sai
sinam si sasina dici debeat si pro non per ipsum tanquam verum possessione dicte terre cum
pertinenciis fregi et interrupi / quam quadam peticionem dicti prepositus et ballivi tanquam iuri et legibus
burgorum consonam admitten' / prefatus thomas de camera balliuus cum dicto domino Alexandro eandem
terram adiuit / et ibidem idem dominus Alexander in presencia dicti thome de camera ballivi et testium
subscriptorum / dictam pretensam saisinam per ipsum datam fregit et interrupit sollemniter protestando
quod iuri suo nullatenus cederet in preiudicium temporibus pro futuris Testibus Alexandro
goldsmyth thoma litstar thoma bening tinctore Donaldo litstar et Duncano
stralogh seriando cum diuersis aliis

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio dicto xxiiijto die marcij / quo die secta vocata et
curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

Eodem die in curia Johannes stevinson filius et heres quondam Johannis stevinson burgensis
huius burgi per thomam fife prelocutorem suum peciit a preposito et ballivis doceri et assignari vt
moris est ad terras et possessiones dicti quondam patris sui sicut filius et heres burgensis
cognosci debeat et doceri / Et si dictus Johannes sic legittimus et propinquior heres
eiusdem quondam Johannis patris sui / quibus mature auisatis per Compertum fuit atque
decretum per curiam / quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam
Johannis patris sui / Et quia Agnes mater dicti Johannis clamabat se habere iunctam
infeodacionem quarundem terrarum dicti quondam Johannis / peciit terminum legalem et diem ad ostendum
iura sua / vnde curia auisata decreuit et ordinauit dictam Agnetam ostendere
et producere coram eis iura sua in die veneris proximo absque vlteriori dilacione sicut
ipsa velit desuper deseruiri Sinautem prepositus et ballivi predicti dicto die veneris
cognoscent dictum Johannem ad dictas terras et possessiones quondam patres sui in quam de
iure poterunt

Willelmus robertson amerciatur pro iniusta extensione plegij super cornelum aventur de madifactione certorum
cinerum ipsius in naui sua in defectu rate nauis / et contrarium iuravit dictus cornelus cum alio
suo nauta in manu sua iuxta ordinacionem assise et cetera

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxviijo die marcij anno et cetera lxxvijo personaliter comparens
Johannes stevinson filius et heres quondam Johannis stevinson burgensis huius burgi ex vna et
Agnes mater eiusdem Johannis ex altera partibus tanquam in termino eisdem assignato super lite
inter ipsos de iuncta infeodacione clamata per dictam Agnetam matrem suam illius terre cum pertinenciis
in qua inhabitavit dictus quondam Johannes defunctus iacentis in vico furcarum huius burgi ex orientali
parte eiusdem mota alias ut patet per actum precedentem / Deinde post diuersas alter caciones po
suerunt se partes predicte ad assisam proborum burgensium ad hoc iuratorum et electorum cum
consensu parcium pro detencione dicte cause / quorum nomina sunt hec videlicet Johannes de mar David colison
Dauid symson gilbertus vaus Robertus blindsele Adam de crafurd thomas de mar
alexander le hay andreas murref senior alexander naghti gilbertus morison Johannes stewart
et Robertus prat / Que quidem assisa mature auisata auditis allegacionibus proba
cionibus cum testibus et euidenciis vtriusque partis inuenit et deliberauit per os dicti gil
berti vaus nomine aliorum eiusdem assise / quod dicta Agnes nullam habet legitti
mam coniunctam infeodacionem prefate terre cum pertinenciis et cetera

Vltima die mensis marcij predicti / Georgius sadillar' conuictus per assisam pro perturbacione
et lesione cuiusdam teutonici de naui Corneli aventur adiudicatur in amerciamento et quod
emendabit dampnum vt Jura volunt

Quo die Johannes huchouson carnifex allegavit coram ballivis pro se et marioria fichet
sponsa sua / quod diuersis vicibus et temporibus elapsis pecijt annum redditum xiij s'
et iiijor d' eis iure hereditario pertinen' a Dauid mathoson de terra quondam thome
quelp iacente in vico furcarum de quatuor annis elapsis / de quo quondam annuo
redditu nequeunt habere solucionem / in ipsorum dampnum non modicum et grauamen / Quare dictus
Johannes pro se et sua sponsa sollemniter protestatus fuit / quod huiusmodi dilacio / non cederet eis in
dampnum seu preiudicium impostrum quo ad eorum Jus dicti annuj redditus

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xjo die aprilis anno etc lxxvijo / gilbertus vaus prosecutus fuit
per plegium Willelmum moyses quod iniuste tenuit ab eo computum vnius dolij vinj et partem solucionis
eiusdem ad valorem quatuor librarum /. vnde ex deliberacione assise idem Willelmus iuravit / quod soluit
prefato gilberto et plenarie satisfecit eidem de dicto vino preterquam duos aut tres solidos

the sam dai the Assise deliuerit that Cornelus aventur skippar made gude fath in presence of thaim that
the twa platis quhilkis thomas schethin clamit him / war gevin in Alesune vre to the tollar'
for the proffit of the hail merchandis gudis of his schip / And that the saidis merchandis gudis
aw to scot and lot with the fornemit platis / And thir ar the namys of the assise
Alexander of chamer John Wormot Dauy mathoson Alexander nachty Androw moir Wil
cadiou / brand the skippar and Arne fansowme ster'man

Item Cornelus aventur skippar declarit be his aith in plain curt that Thom of murra
quhilk wes sterman' til him / brocht na buyrdys of his the said thom in his schip
that he wist of /

Be it kend til al men be thir present lettres me James clerc burges of Aberdene tobe bundin and
oblist be the faith of my body til a worthy man Richard hil burges of the said burgh in
twa pundis gretis of the vsual mone of flandris for certan some of the said mone tain
and ressauit be me fra Robert averdale portour of brugis on the behalf of the saide
Richard Tobe pait til the forsaid Richart or his procuratour in brugis in maner and fourm
as eftir folois that is tosay a pund g' in the erast schip that salis oute of the
port of abirdene god willand eftir the date of thir lettres within xv dais eftir that scho
sal hapin til arryve in flandris holand or seland but ony langar delay And the
tothir pund g' tobe pait in the erast schip and rais' next thareftir passing oute of
the said port of Aberdene aryvand in ony of the fornemit portis in maner and fourme
before expremit And gif it sal hapin me to falye in payment of the said ija li'
g' in al or in part at dais and place foresaid as god forbede I oblis' me myn
airis executouris and assignais our landis and gudis quhare evir thai be fundin tocontent and
pay the said Richard his ayris executouris or assignais for ilk li' g' being vnpait
aucht noblis of vsual payment of Scotland but ony diminicion or defalcacion to
giddir with al costis scathis dampnis and interess' that he or thai sustenis in defaut
of' payment of the said som alsweil as the principale Na remede of law tobe proponit
in the contrar' In witnes heirof becaus' I had na seil propir I haue procurit with
instance the sele of a discret man Ranald talyour burges of aberdene tobe affixit to
thir lettres in aberdene the vj dai of August the yer' of god M iiijc lxxvj yeris
before thir witnes Alexander rede androw atkyn burgez of the said burgh and patrik badenach
the son with vthiris sindri / And nochtwithstanding that I am bundin in viij noblis' for ilk
li' g' gif it hapnis me to falye in payment as is before writin / I bynd and
oblis' me to pay bot samekil as it sal hapin the said Richard or his factouris
togif for the li' g' in faute of payment / Of the sowme of this obligacion
pait to the said Richard in aberdene a li' g' before thom prat
De qua littera obligatoria sigillata sigillo Ranaldi talyour predicti ostensa in curia / prefatus Ricardus
hil peciit a preposito et ballivis hanc copiam ponj in hoc libro curie burgi propter pericula maris et
viarum eminencia / et cetera

Curia capitalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xiiijto die Aprilis anno Domini mo
iiijco lxxvijo / quo die secta vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

Eodem die alexander trail primo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis malisson responsurus plegio super ipsum alexandrum
in manibus philippi de Dunbrek vnius seriandorum per dictum Johannem extenso pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de
xxv s' vj d' solut' per dictum Johannam pro custuma octo barellarum et dimidium barelle salmonum pertinen' eidem
alexandro / et de tribus libris pro parte sua de li rynche wyne propinato per Willelmum moyses
de quo vino eidem alexandro plenariam fecit solucionem / Non comparuit / Quare precipitur sergeando ad capiendum
districtum et cetera et ad summonendum ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

Item eodem die coram preposito et ballivis in curia Joneta lorymar et Alizona lorymar' soro
res filie quondam Willelmi lorymar burgensis de aberdene vnanimi consensu et assensu fecerunt con
stituerunt et ordinarunt / Dauid de mar' thomam de mar et alexandrum cassy suos ve
ros legittimos et indubitatos procuratores actores factores et deputatos speciales ad prosequendum
nomine ipsarum omnia Jura sua que habent aut habere poterunt ad aliquas terras annuos red
ditus et possessiones / ac omnia iura hereditaria quorumcumque bonorum eisdem pertinencium per deces
sum quondam dicti Willelmi patris sui Et ad agendum et defendendum pro se in omnibis premissis et aliis
causis seu placitis quibuscumque prout ordo Juris exigit et requirit Et dicte constituen' promise
runt et obligauerunt se per extensionem manuum suarum ad subeundum et perimplendum omnia et singula
que dicti procuratores in premissis rite duxerint faciend' et cetera

Item eodem die dominus matheus nicolson capellanus protestatus fuit in plena curia nomine et ex parte
Agnetis necolson sororis sue relicte quondam Willelmi lorymar / quod cognicio Jonete et alizo
ne filiarum quondam dicti Willelmi ad terram eiusdem quondam Willelmi patris earundem petit' per
Dauid de mar' ex parte dictarum filiarum per ballivos fieri / non cederet dicte agnete
in preiudicium Juris sui de assedacione prefate terre quam habet ad terminum quatuor anno
rum ut asseruit futurorum

Item assisa deliberauit quod Johannes symson mercator alexandro rede in hac parte fecit eidem
alexandro quod de iure debuit penes vendicionem et disposicionem bonorum suorum sibi commissorum

The same dai / the Aldirman proponit to the hale consale and comunite belanging the biging
of the qveyr schawand the thankis and kyndnes that my lord of Aberdene has
perofferit / ffor the quhilkis the aldirman consale and comunitee forsaidis has grantit
to the biging of the qveyr / al feis of aldirman balyeis dene of gilde Abbot
and priour' of this burgh with the common gude and al vtheris proffitis that may be gottin
for sevyn yeris tocum and mare gif it nedis be the sight of thir personis vndir
writin that is tosay / Androw scherar' aldirman Alexander of chavmer alexander meignes Johne
of mar' Johne of Knollis Dauid colison thomas of fife alexander rede and Alexander howison / quhilkis persons
sal haue ful commissione vndir the commoune seil of the said burgh et cetera
